div.p: ‘Ulpius Celer to Hermeros, greeting. Allow me, sir, to commend to your notice … on, a slave of our lord the Emperor, a member of my household and esteemed by me. He is most deserving of advancement and of your favour, and I do not disguise that any service you can render him in his career will be most welcome to me. Farewell.
To Claudius Hermeros, son of Titus, imperial procurator. (2nd h.) Given at Panopolis by me Celer….’
